= Bamo128 = 
is a resident monitor program for AVR8 microcontroller. It is written in assembler and you can burn it with an appropriate programmer (avrIspmkII, stk500,..) and programming software (arvdude) in the microcontroller. After reset teh monitor starts and waits for interaction with the user over serial communication lines (R232, USB) and a pc-terminal software. arduinokermit http://www.minikermit.googlecode.com is a terminal program well adapted for bamo128.<br>
